comment:
играется на пропсе бродяги (погиб после реинфорса Faith в Beggar_dialogue), 
если не поднят флаг BeggarUnarmed

languages.text: Истерзанный труп бродяги, похитившего ваши ботинки. Его губы сложены в умиротворенную улыбку, а рука сжимает пистолет, из которого явно недавно стреляли.

traits.locale_text: Истерзанный труп бродяги, похитившего ваши ботинки. Его губы сложены в умиротворенную улыбку, а рука сжимает пистолет, из которого явно недавно стреляли.

languages.text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.
languages.original_text: Истерзанный труп бродяги, похитившего ваши ботинки. Его губы сложены в умиротворенную улыбку, а рука сжимает пистолет, из которого явно недавно стреляли.

traits.locale_text: The ravaged corpse of the vagabond who stole your boots. There is a peaceful smile on his lips, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.
The ravaged corpse of the vagabond who stole your boots. There is a peaceful smile on his lips, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.
The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.
The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.
The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.
The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.

languages.text: あなたのブーツを盗んだ乞食のボロボロの死体。彼の唇は穏やかな笑みを浮かべ、手には最近発砲されたと思われるピストルが握られている。
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.

traits.locale_text: あなたのブーツを盗んだ乞食のボロボロの死体。彼の唇は穏やかな笑みを浮かべ、手には最近発砲されたと思われるピストルが握られている。

languages.text: 偷走你靴子的乞丐倒在地上，尸体残破不堪。他的嘴角挂着安详的微笑，手里紧紧握着一把手枪，似乎在不久前刚刚开过火。
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.

traits.locale_text: 偷走你靴子的乞丐倒在地上，尸体残破不堪。他的嘴角挂着安详的微笑，手里紧紧握着一把手枪，似乎在不久前刚刚开过火。

languages.text: El cadáver destrozado del mendigo que te robó las botas. Sus labios forman una sonrisa serena y su mano empuña una pistola que parece haber sido disparada hace poco.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.

traits.locale_text: El cadáver destrozado del mendigo que te robó las botas. Sus labios forman una sonrisa serena y su mano empuña una pistola que parece haber sido disparada hace poco.

languages.text: Die entstellte Leiche des Bettlers, der deine Stiefel gestohlen hat. Seine Lippen formen ein friedliches Lächeln, und seine Hand umklammert eine Pistole, die wohl kürzlich abgefeuert wurde.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.

traits.locale_text: Die entstellte Leiche des Bettlers, der deine Stiefel gestohlen hat. Seine Lippen formen ein friedliches Lächeln, und seine Hand umklammert eine Pistole, die wohl kürzlich abgefeuert wurde.

languages.text: Le corps ravagé du mendiant qui vous avait volé vos bottes. Un sourire serein aux lèvres, il tient fermement dans ses mains un pistolet qui semble avoir été utilisé récemment.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.

traits.locale_text: Le corps ravagé du mendiant qui vous avait volé vos bottes. Un sourire serein aux lèvres, il tient fermement dans ses mains un pistolet qui semble avoir été utilisé récemment.

languages.text: Botlarını çalan dilencinin harap olmuş cesedi. Dudaklarında huzurlu bir gülümseme, elindeyse yakın zamanda ateşlenmiş gibi duran bir tabanca var.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and his hand is clutching a pistol, which appears to have been fired recently.

traits.locale_text: Botlarını çalan dilencinin harap olmuş cesedi. Dudaklarında huzurlu bir gülümseme var, elinde yakın zamanda ateşlenmiş gibi duran bir tabanca var.
